idea:
Greetings of the day from D4G...


With reference to our discussion held regarding security services / Facility Services, we would like to submit our profile for your ready reference.


Details representing our company are appended below for you.


We introduce ourselves as the most prestigious and pioneer in the field of Security Services.Security is the most crucial need of human being. Today we live in the world, which is full of crime, violence, mistrust and treachery. The uncertainty has plunged mankind into the plethora of insecurity. The need of the hour is to recognize the right security agency that can be authorized trustfully the responsibility of security and safety. The selection of right security agency, which certainly is leading the battle on the front of well trained, honest, disciplined and faithful guarding personnel, is a difficult task. In the case of M/s. DIAL 4 GUARD ., one can rely upon its sincerity, efficiency and integrity for the below reasons more precisely appended below:


We are pleased to introduce Dial 4 Guard, as a well-established, security agency for your arrived requirement.


 As a professional company, we are having a strong operational team at strategically placed offices near you to ensure consistent service approach.


 We are a compliant organisation & will ensure 100% compliance for services confirmed to us for you.

 D4G has a strong base & Good Networking arrangement to deal with local issues to ensure continues services. 


 D4G possess all registrations and Licenses to run its operations.


 D4G guarding personnel with the backup of training can be compared with the most disciplined forces of the country.


 D4G ensures minimum Four Surprise Checks and a Mass raid each month by senior members of Management during night which keep guarding personnel alert, attentive and disciplined.


 D4G provides job security and well-secure future to its guarding personnel by guarantying them wages and other statutory benefits applicable under various enactments and maintain their morale high by resolving financial issues.


 D4G undertakes responsibility of making good of losses incurred due to omissions/ commissions on its part.

D4G POSSESS ALL THE LICENSES TO ENSURE COMPLIANCES AS PER STATE IMPLEMENTED RULES & REGULATIONS AND THEY ARE AS UNDER:

 D4G - PSARA LICENC no. is 395/2018, dated:11/05/2018

 D4G - Shop & Establishment Ref No. 1810200392062717

 D4G - PAN No. AANFD3039M

 D4G - TAN No. PNED12152A

 D4G - Provident Fund Registration No. THTHA179632000

 D4G - ESIC Code No. 34000381550000999

 D4G - MLWF Ref No:. THA81786

 D4G - GST Registration No. 27AANFD3039M1Z2


D4G PRESENCE IN MAHARASHTRA:


As a company we have our presence in Four Zones Across Maharashtra and they are as under:


1)KALYAN, 2) BHANDUP , 3) LOWERPAREL, 4) CHIPLUN, 5) KOLHAPUR, 6) VASAI

Thus would like to submit detailed D4G profile at the ENCLOSURES stating our policies and approach for our clients. kindly check the details.

Also Commercials in line with your requirement is attached for reference; which may be guided to us so that it can be tailored as per your requirement, such offer can be made available for your review after necessary inputs.


We believe that you certainly would be keen to know something more about us. Obviously a personal meeting is needed to convince you in detail that why D4G should only be your FIRST CHOICE.


We are looking forward for a very personalized meeting at an early date and wish for our association with your esteemed organization.

Thanking you,

Yours faithfully,

For DIAL 4 GUARD

(NEXT GENERATION SECURITY AND FACILITY MANAGEMENT ©™)

Ajay Singh Bhadoria

Managing Director

Co. No. 09082243997

Email: asb@d4g.co.in; info@d4g.co.in
name: D4G (DIAL 4 GUARD)

idea: We are a renewable energy startup operating in the western region of India. We do solar EPC projects for residential, commercial and industrial consumers on capex. In order to increase adoption of solar energy we have introduced solar projects on opex model too. We also provide combination of Solar and EV charging Stations for lower operational cost for faster adoption of electric vehicles in India
name: ALPI-POLARIZ TECHSOL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Muscle Gears is a FSSAI Certified organization, engaged in business of Nutritional supplements in Fitness, Bodybuilding and sports segments .Our products are manufactured at FSSAI and GMP certified Facility. It has all the other necessary certification form FDA and other the authorities like ISO 2000, etc.. All our products are approved and certified from FDA and then manufactured. Though we have in house facility for lab test, we always certify it from the third party government approved lab for customer satisfaction. We guarantee and certify the content in our product as per FSSAI standard as compared to some local company and even some International Brands. Our Raw materials are purchased from the genuine suppliers and our whey is imported whey, hence the quality which we maintain is as per International standard and are economical as well. Hence you get same product with best price and better quality with guaranteed content. Muscle Gears is committed to endorse your wellbeing and living life to its fullest potential without any compromise, as we believe that our Growth and advancement comes with your wellbeing .Hence our core values are Quality, Genuineness, Guarantee, and service with customer satisfaction.
name: MUSCLEGEARS SPORTS NUTRITION PRIVATE LIMITED
